attributes.action: Referendum on this leach of a royal family
attributes.additional_details:
The royal family are leaches and a strain on our society and Kingdom.
Over £300,000,000 to fix their house? 
You could literally rehabilitate every homeless person in the UK for that amount!
the royal family did benifit the UK in the past but now that times have changed they are nothing but a leach and a reminder of our horrible empire past
attributes.background: I am a passionate born citizen of the United Kingdom and only want what is best for everyone. Not just the top 20 percent (which holds 80 percent of the money)
